metadata.title: CVE-2021-39272 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - low
metadata.description:
Fetchmail before 6.4.22 fails to enforce STARTTLS session encryption insome circumstances, such as a certain situation with IMAP and PREAUTH.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-39272` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fetchmail - 6.4.32-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fetchmail package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.4.32-1').
